name: Classic Cappuccino
description: A timeless coffeehouse staple, our cappuccino combines expertly pulled espresso with velvety steamed milk and a luxurious layer of milk foam.

name: Vanilla Bean Latte
description: Indulge in the sweet symphony of our Vanilla Bean Latte, where premium espresso meets steamed milk infused with real vanilla bean paste.

name: Hazelnut Mocha
description: A decadent treat for chocolate and nut enthusiasts, our Hazelnut Mocha blends rich, dark chocolate sauce with nutty hazelnut syrup.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Experience the delightful layers of our Caramel Macchiato, featuring velvety steamed milk, a shot of bold espresso, and a generous drizzle of gooey caramel sauce.

name: Iced Coconut Matcha Latte
description: Premium, ceremonial-grade matcha is whisked with coconut milk and poured over ice, offering a creamy, tropical variation that's both energizing and refreshing.

name: Cold Brew Coffee
description: Brewed slowly over 24 hours, this method produces a less acidic and highly caffeinated beverage. Enjoy it black or with a splash of milk.

name: Spiced Chai Latte
description: A warm and inviting blend of aromatic spices and rich black tea, our Spiced Chai Latte is steamed with milk for a comforting and flavorful experience.

name: Classic Espresso
description: A rich and robust espresso, crafted from a blend of premium Arabica beans, offering a smooth yet intense flavor profile with hints of dark chocolate and a velvety crema finish.
